mapper.select: WITH MENU1 AS ( SELECT T101.MENU_ID, T101.MENU_NM, T101.ICON_CLASS, T101.PGM_ID, T101.UP_MENU_ID, T101.MENU_TYPE, TO_CHAR(T101.SORT_NO, '0009') AS SORT_ORD, T101.SORT_NO, T101.MENU_GRP_CD, 1 AS LVL FROM PEN_MENU_M T101 WHERE T101.APP_ID = #{appId} AND (T101.UP_MENU_ID IS NULL OR T101.UP_MENU_ID = '') AND T101.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T101.USE_YN = 'Y' ), MENU2 AS ( SELECT T101.MENU_ID, T101.MENU_NM, T101.ICON_CLASS, T101.PGM_ID, T101.UP_MENU_ID, T101.MENU_TYPE, T102.SORT_ORD||TO_CHAR(T101.SORT_NO, '0009') AS SORT_ORD, T101.SORT_NO, T101.MENU_GRP_CD, T102.LVL+1 AS LVL FROM PEN_MENU_M T101 INNER JOIN MENU1 T102 ON ( T101.UP_MENU_ID = T102.MENU_ID ) WHERE T101.APP_ID = #{appId} AND T101.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T101.USE_YN = 'Y' ), MENU3 AS ( SELECT T101.MENU_ID, T101.MENU_NM, T101.ICON_CLASS, T101.PGM_ID, T101.UP_MENU_ID, T101.MENU_TYPE, T102.SORT_ORD||TO_CHAR(T101.SORT_NO, '0009') AS SORT_ORD, T101.SORT_NO, T101.MENU_GRP_CD, T102.LVL+1 AS LVL FROM PEN_MENU_M T101 INNER JOIN MENU2 T102 ON ( T101.UP_MENU_ID = T102.MENU_ID ) WHERE T101.APP_ID = #{appId} AND T101.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T101.USE_YN = 'Y' ), MENU4 AS ( SELECT T101.MENU_ID, T101.MENU_NM, T101.ICON_CLASS, T101.PGM_ID, T101.UP_MENU_ID, T101.MENU_TYPE, T102.SORT_ORD||TO_CHAR(T101.SORT_NO, '0009') AS SORT_ORD, T101.SORT_NO, T101.MENU_GRP_CD, T102.LVL+1 AS LVL FROM PEN_MENU_M T101 INNER JOIN MENU3 T102 ON ( T101.UP_MENU_ID = T102.MENU_ID ) WHERE T101.APP_ID = #{appId} AND T101.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T101.USE_YN = 'Y' ) SELECT T101.MENU_GRP_CD AS "menuGrpCd", T101.MENU_ID AS "menuId" , T101.ICON_CLASS AS "iconClass" , T101.MENU_NM AS "menuNm" , T101.MENU_TYPE AS "menuType", T102.PGM_ID AS "pgmId" , T101.UP_MENU_ID AS "upMenuId" , T101.SORT_NO AS "sortNo" , case when T102.PGM_ID is null then T101.PGM_ID else T102.SCREEN_ID end AS "menuPath" , T101.LVL as "menuLvl" FROM ( SELECT * FROM MENU1 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM MENU2 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM MENU3 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM MENU4 ) T101 left join ( select * from PEN_PGM_M ) T102 on T101.PGM_ID = T102.pgm_id ORDER BY T101.SORT_ORD

WITH MENU_USER_AUTH AS ( SELECT APP_ID , MENU_ID , PRIV_OPER_GBN FROM PEN_SYS_PRIV_MENU_R WHERE PRIV_RCVR_GBN = 'U' AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND PRIV_RCVR_ID = #{sessionInfo.userId} AND APP_ID = #{appId} ), MENU_GRP_ROLE_AUTH AS ( SELECT APP_ID , MENU_ID , PRIV_OPER_GBN FROM PEN_SYS_PRIV_MENU_R T101 INNER JOIN PEN_SYS_USER_GRP_M T102 ON ( T101.PRIV_RCVR_ID = T102.USER_GRP_ID AND T102.USER_GRP_TYPE = 'FUNC_ACCESS' AND T102.PRIV_YN = 'Y' AND T102.USE_YN = 'Y' AND T102.DEL_YN = 'N' ) INNER JOIN PEN_SYS_GRP_R T103 ON ( T102.USER_GRP_ID = T103.USER_GRP_ID AND T103.DEL_YN = 'N' ) INNER JOIN PEN_SYS_GRP_USER_R T104 ON ( T103.REL_USER_GRP_ID = T104.USER_GRP_ID AND T104.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T104.USER_ID = #{sessionInfo.userId} ) WHERE T101.PRIV_RCVR_GBN = 'G' AND T101.DEL_YN = 'N' AND APP_ID = #{appId} ), MENU_GRP_USER_AUTH AS ( SELECT APP_ID , MENU_ID , PRIV_OPER_GBN FROM PEN_SYS_PRIV_MENU_R T101 INNER JOIN PEN_SYS_USER_GRP_M T102 ON ( T101.PRIV_RCVR_ID = T102.USER_GRP_ID AND T102.USER_GRP_TYPE = 'FUNC_ACCESS' AND T102.PRIV_YN = 'Y' AND T102.USE_YN = 'Y' AND T102.DEL_YN = 'N' ) INNER JOIN PEN_SYS_GRP_USER_R T104 ON ( T102.USER_GRP_ID = T104.USER_GRP_ID AND T104.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T104.USER_ID = #{sessionInfo.userId} ) WHERE T101.PRIV_RCVR_GBN = 'G' AND T101.DEL_YN = 'N' AND APP_ID = #{appId} ) SELECT DISTINCT T101.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM MENU_USER_AUTH UNION ALL SELECT * FROM MENU_GRP_ROLE_AUTH UNION ALL SELECT * FROM MENU_GRP_USER_AUTH ) T101 ORDER BY MENU_ID

SELECT * FROM ( WITH GRP AS ( SELECT USER_GRP_ID, USER_ID FROM PEN_SYS_GRP_USER_R WHERE USER_ID = #{sessionInfo.userId} ), MENU_GRP AS ( SELECT 'G' AS PRIV_RCVR_GBN, T01.USER_GRP_ID FROM PEN_SYS_GRP_R T01 JOIN GRP T02 ON (T01.REL_USER_GRP_ID = T02.USER_GRP_ID) UNION ALL SELECT 'G' AS PRIV_RCVR_GBN, USER_GRP_ID FROM PEN_SYS_GRP_R WHERE REL_USER_GRP_ID = 'ALL' UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'U' AS PRIV_RCVR_GBN, GRP.USER_ID AS ROLE_ID FROM GRP ), MENU_AUTH AS ( SELECT T01.APP_ID AS APP_ID, T01.MENU_ID AS MENU_ID, MAX(SUBSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN, 1, INSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,1)-1)) AS C_AUTH, MAX(SUBSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,INSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,1) +1, INSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,2) - INSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,1)-1)) AS R_AUTH, MAX(SUBSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,INSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,2) + 1, INSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,3) - INSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,2)-1)) AS U_AUTH, MAX(SUBSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,INSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,3) + 1, INSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,4) - INSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,3)-1)) AS D_AUTH, MAX(SUBSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,INSTR(T01.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,4) + 1)) AS E_AUTH FROM PEN_SYS_PRIV_MENU_R T01 JOIN MENU_GRP T02 ON ( T01.PRIV_RCVR_GBN = T02.PRIV_RCVR_GBN AND T01.PRIV_RCVR_ID = T02.USER_GRP_ID ) WHERE T01.APP_ID = #{appId} GROUP BY T01.APP_ID, T01.MENU_ID ) SELECT * FROM MENU_AUTH UNION ALL SELECT APP_ID, MENU_ID, MAX(SUBSTR(T03.PRIV_OPER_GBN, 1, INSTR(T03.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,1)-1)) AS C_AUTH, MAX(SUBSTR(T03.PRIV_OPER_GBN,INSTR(T03.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,1) +1, INSTR(T03.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,2) - INSTR(T03.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,1)-1)) AS R_AUTH, MAX(SUBSTR(T03.PRIV_OPER_GBN,INSTR(T03.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,2) + 1, INSTR(T03.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,3) - INSTR(T03.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,2)-1)) AS U_AUTH, MAX(SUBSTR(T03.PRIV_OPER_GBN,INSTR(T03.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,3) + 1, INSTR(T03.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,4) - INSTR(T03.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,3)-1)) AS D_AUTH, MAX(SUBSTR(T03.PRIV_OPER_GBN,INSTR(T03.PRIV_OPER_GBN,':',1,4) + 1)) AS E_AUTH FROM ( SELECT APP_ID, MENU_ID, 'N:N:N:N:N' AS PRIV_OPER_GBN FROM PEN_MENU_M T03 ) T03 WHERE T03.APP_ID = #{appId} AND T03.MENU_ID NOT IN (SELECT MENU_ID FROM MENU_AUTH) GROUP BY T03.APP_ID, T03.MENU_ID ) WHERE MENU_ID = #{menuId}

SELECT T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T102.OBJ_TYPE_NM FROM PEN_REL_TYPE_M T101 INNER JOIN PEN_OBJ_TYPE_M T102 ON ( T101.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID ) WHERE T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '030103L' AND T101.META_REL_CD = 'IR' AND T101.ATR_ADM_CD = 1 AND T101.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T102.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID

SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN OBJ_ATR_VAL IS NULL THEN '[담당자없음]' ELSE OBJ_ATR_VAL END AS QLTY_CHRGR FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '030103L' AND ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 ORDER BY CASE WHEN QLTY_CHRGR = '[담당자없음]' THEN NULL ELSE QLTY_CHRGR END

SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN OBJ_ATR_VAL IS NULL THEN '[담당자없음]' ELSE OBJ_ATR_VAL END AS QLTY_CHRGR FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = '030199L' AND ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 ORDER BY CASE WHEN QLTY_CHRGR = '[담당자없음]' THEN NULL ELSE QLTY_CHRGR END
SELECT T101.CD_GRP_ID , T101.CD_ID , T101.CD_NM FROM PEN_CD_M T101 WHERE T101.CD_GRP_ID = #{cdGrpId} AND T101.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T101.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY T101.SORT_NO
SELECT MENU_ID AS "menuId" , MENU_NM AS "menuNm" , 'portal/view' AS "url" , PGM_ID AS "viewId" , '' AS "queryStr" FROM PEN_MENU_M WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND MENU_TYPE != 'FOLDER'

SELECT OBJ_TYPE_ID , OBJ_ID , PATH_OBJ_ID , OBJ_NM , LEVEL AS LVL ,CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF AS LEAF FROM PEN_OBJ_M WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID IN ('901001L','901002L') START WITH PATH_OBJ_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR OBJ_ID=PATH_OBJ_ID

SELECT M.OBJ_TYPE_ID ,M.OBJ_ID ,M.OBJ_NM ,D1.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS ATTACH_FILE_NAME ,D12.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS ATTACH_ORG_NAME ,D13.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS ATTACH_SIZE ,D14.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS ATTACH_FILE_TYPE ,D15.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS ATTACH_FILE_PATH ,D2.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS HTML_FILE_NAME ,D22.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS HTML_ORG_NAME ,D23.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS HTML_SIZE ,D24.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS HTML_FILE_TYPE ,D25.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS HTML_FILE_PATH ,D3.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS URL_ADDR ,D4.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS SAVE_LOCATION FROM PEN_OBJ_M M LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D1 ON(M.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D1.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M.OBJ_ID=D1.OBJ_ID AND D1.ATR_ID_SEQ=101 AND D1.ATR_VAL_SEQ=101) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D12 ON(M.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D12.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M.OBJ_ID=D12.OBJ_ID AND D12.ATR_ID_SEQ=101 AND D12.ATR_VAL_SEQ=102) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D13 ON(M.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D13.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M.OBJ_ID=D13.OBJ_ID AND D13.ATR_ID_SEQ=101 AND D13.ATR_VAL_SEQ=103) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D14 ON(M.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D14.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M.OBJ_ID=D14.OBJ_ID AND D14.ATR_ID_SEQ=101 AND D14.ATR_VAL_SEQ=104) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D15 ON(M.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D15.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M.OBJ_ID=D15.OBJ_ID AND D15.ATR_ID_SEQ=101 AND D15.ATR_VAL_SEQ=105) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D2 ON(M.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D2.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M.OBJ_ID=D2.OBJ_ID AND D2.ATR_ID_SEQ=102 AND D2.ATR_VAL_SEQ=101) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D22 ON(M.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D22.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M.OBJ_ID=D22.OBJ_ID AND D22.ATR_ID_SEQ=102 AND D22.ATR_VAL_SEQ=102) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D23 ON(M.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D23.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M.OBJ_ID=D23.OBJ_ID AND D23.ATR_ID_SEQ=102 AND D23.ATR_VAL_SEQ=103) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D24 ON(M.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D24.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M.OBJ_ID=D24.OBJ_ID AND D24.ATR_ID_SEQ=102 AND D24.ATR_VAL_SEQ=104) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D25 ON(M.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D25.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M.OBJ_ID=D25.OBJ_ID AND D25.ATR_ID_SEQ=102 AND D25.ATR_VAL_SEQ=105) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D3 ON(M.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D3.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M.OBJ_ID=D3.OBJ_ID AND D3.ATR_ID_SEQ=103 AND D3.ATR_VAL_SEQ=101) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D4 ON(M.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D4.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M.OBJ_ID=D4.OBJ_ID AND D4.ATR_ID_SEQ=104 AND D4.ATR_VAL_SEQ=101) WHERE M.OBJ_TYPE_ID='901002L' AND M.OBJ_ID=#{objId} AND M.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID='901001L'

SELECT OBJ_TYPE_ID , OBJ_ID , PATH_OBJ_ID , OBJ_NM , LEVEL AS LVL ,CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF AS LEAF FROM PEN_OBJ_M WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID IN ('090101L','090102L') START WITH PATH_OBJ_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR OBJ_ID=PATH_OBJ_ID

SELECT M.OBJ_TYPE_ID ,M.OBJ_ID ,M.OBJ_NM ,M.OBJ_DESC ,CASE WHEN D1.CNCT_ATR_YN = 'Y' THEN ( SELECT SUBSTR( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT(COL ,' ', OBJ_ATR_VAL) ORDER BY ATR_VAL_SEQ).EXTRACT('//text()' ).GETCLOBVAL() , 0) FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = M.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND OBJ_ID = M.OBJ_ID AND ATR_ID_SEQ=105 ) ELSE TO_CLOB((SELECT OBJ_ATR_VAL FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = M.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND OBJ_ID = M.OBJ_ID AND ATR_ID_SEQ=105 AND ATR_VAL_SEQ=101)) END AS QUERY_VALUE ,CASE WHEN D2.CNCT_ATR_YN = 'Y' THEN ( SELECT SUBSTR( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT(COL ,' ', OBJ_ATR_VAL) ORDER BY ATR_VAL_SEQ).EXTRACT('//text()' ).GETCLOBVAL() , 0) FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = M.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND OBJ_ID = M.OBJ_ID AND ATR_ID_SEQ=106 ) ELSE TO_CLOB((SELECT OBJ_ATR_VAL FROM PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = M.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND OBJ_ID = M.OBJ_ID AND ATR_ID_SEQ=106 AND ATR_VAL_SEQ=101)) END AS QUERY_DESC FROM PEN_OBJ_M M LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_TYPE_ATR_D D1 ON(M.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D1.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND D1.ATR_ID_SEQ=105) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_TYPE_ATR_D D2 ON(M.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D2.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND D2.ATR_ID_SEQ=106) WHERE M.OBJ_TYPE_ID='090102L' AND M.OBJ_ID=#{objId} AND M.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID='090101L'
